name: Import Breeze.pm tasks automatically in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new task is created in Breeze.pm, Make will automatically add a new row in Google Sheets. The templates uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JIm5CRSC6GWWZl3fsfP6pZol2cxFepuj8fSjV-R1btM/edit?usp=sharing).
